creator: BlockFabric
name: ERC20 Token Contract
description: ERC20 is an standard for fungible assets, outlining a common list of rules for tokens to follow, enabling interoperability across different interfaces and dApps.

creator: BlockFabric
name: ERC721 NFT Contract
description: ERC721 is an open standard for creating non-fungible tokens (NFTs) on the blockchain, allowing for the ownership and transfer of unique assets.

creator: BlockFabric
name: Crowd Sale Contract
description: A Crowd Sale Contract facilitates the raising of funds by selling a ERC20 token to investors at a specific price, in a defined timeframe, directly on the blockchain.

creator: BlockFabric
name: One Time Subscription Contract
description: A One Time Subscription Contract manages product subscriptions on the blockchain. It allows users to purchase products once, and owners to add products and set prices.

creator: BlockFabric
name: DAO Governance Contract
description: A DAO (Decentralized Autonomous Organization) Governance Contract allows for decentralized decision-making on the blockchain. It includes features like proposal creation, voting mechanisms, and execution of decisions based on the outcome of votes.
